title: SseData
description: The "data" field of the events sent on the event stream to clients.

anyOf.description: The version of this node's API server.  This event will always be the first sent to a new client, and will have no associated event ID provided.
The given block has been added to the linear chain and stored locally.
The given deploy has been newly-accepted by this node.
The given deploy has been executed, committed and forms part of the given block.
The given deploy has expired.
Generic representation of validator's fault in an era.
New finality signature received.
The execution effects produced by a `StepRequest`.

proofs.description: JSON-friendly list of proofs for this block.

JsonBlockHeader.description: JSON representation of a block header.

JsonEraReport.description: Equivocation and reward information to be included in the terminal block.

PublicKey.description: Hex-encoded cryptographic public key, including the algorithm tag prefix.

JsonProof.description: A JSON-friendly representation of a proof, i.e. a block's finality signature.

Signature.description: Hex-encoded cryptographic signature, including the algorithm tag prefix.

Deploy.description: A deploy; an item containing a smart contract along with the requester's signature(s).

ExecutableDeployItem.description: Represents possible variants of an executable deploy.

anyOf.description: Executable specified as raw bytes that represent WASM code and an instance of [`RuntimeArgs`].
Stored contract referenced by its [`ContractHash`], entry point and an instance of [`RuntimeArgs`].
Stored contract referenced by a named key existing in the signer's account context, entry point and an instance of [`RuntimeArgs`].
Stored versioned contract referenced by its [`ContractPackageHash`], entry point and an instance of [`RuntimeArgs`].

version.description: An optional version of the contract to call. It will default to the highest enabled version if no value is specified.

anyOf.description: Stored versioned contract referenced by a named key existing in the signer's account context, entry point and an instance of [`RuntimeArgs`].

version.description: An optional version of the contract to call. It will default to the highest enabled version if no value is specified.

anyOf.description: A native transfer which does not contain or reference a WASM code.

RuntimeArgs.description: Represents a collection of arguments passed to a smart contract.

CLValue.description:
A Casper value, i.e. a value which can be stored and manipulated by smart contracts.

It holds the underlying data as a type-erased, serialized `Vec<u8>` and also holds the CLType of the underlying data as a separate member.

The `parsed` field, representing the original value, is a convenience only available when a CLValue is encoded to JSON, and can always be set to null if preferred.

CLType.description:
Casper types, i.e. types which can be stored and manipulated by smart contracts.

Provides a description of the underlying data type of a [`CLValue`](crate::CLValue).

anyOf.description: `Option` of a `CLType`.
Variable-length list of a single `CLType` (comparable to a `Vec`).
Fixed-length list of a single `CLType` (comparable to a Rust array).
`Result` with `Ok` and `Err` variants of `CLType`s.
Map with keys of a single `CLType` and values of a single `CLType`.
1-ary tuple of a `CLType`.
2-ary tuple of `CLType`s.
3-ary tuple of `CLType`s.

Approval.description: A struct containing a signature of a deploy hash and the public key of the signer.

ExecutionResult.description: The result of executing a single deploy.

anyOf.description: The result of a failed execution.

effect.description: The effect of executing the deploy.

transfers.description: A record of Transfers performed while executing the deploy.

cost.description: The cost of executing the deploy.

error_message.description: The error message associated with executing the deploy.

anyOf.description: The result of a successful execution.

effect.description: The effect of executing the deploy.

transfers.description: A record of Transfers performed while executing the deploy.

cost.description: The cost of executing the deploy.

ExecutionEffect.description: The journal of execution transforms from a single deploy.

Operation.description: An operation performed while executing a deploy.

OpKind.description: The type of operation performed while executing a deploy.

TransformEntry.description: A transformation performed while executing a deploy.

Transform.description: The actual transformation performed while executing a deploy.

anyOf.description: Writes the given CLValue to global state.
Writes the given Account to global state.
Writes the given DeployInfo to global state.
Writes the given EraInfo to global state.
Writes the given Transfer to global state.
Writes the given Bid to global state.
Writes the given Withdraw to global state.
Adds the given `i32`.
Adds the given `u64`.
Adds the given `U128`.
Adds the given `U256`.
Adds the given `U512`.
Adds the given collection of named keys.
A failed transformation, containing an error message.
Writes the given Unbonding to global state.

DeployInfo.description: Information relating to the given Deploy.

from.description: Account identifier of the creator of the Deploy.

source.description: Source purse used for payment of the Deploy.

gas.description: Gas cost of executing the Deploy.

EraInfo.description: Auction metadata.  Intended to be recorded at each era.

anyOf.description: Info about a seigniorage allocation for a validator
Info about a seigniorage allocation for a delegator

Transfer.description: Represents a transfer from one purse to another

from.description: Account from which transfer was executed

to.description: Account to which funds are transferred

Bid.description: An entry in the validator map.

bonding_purse.description: The purse that was used for bonding.

staked_amount.description: The amount of tokens staked by a validator (not including delegators).

vesting_schedule.description: Vesting schedule for a genesis validator. `None` if non-genesis validator.

delegators.description: This validator's delegators, indexed by their public keys

Delegator.description: Represents a party delegating their stake to a validator (or "delegatee")

WithdrawPurse.description: A withdraw purse, a legacy structure.

era_of_creation.description: Era in which this unbonding request was created.

key.description: The value of the entry: a casper `Key` type.

era_of_creation.description: Era in which this unbonding request was created.

new_validator.description: The validator public key to re-delegate to.

FinalitySignature.description: A validator's signature of a block, to confirm it is finalized. Clients and joining nodes should wait until the signers' combined weight exceeds their fault tolerance threshold before accepting the block as finalized.

block_hash.description: Hash of a block this signature is for.

era_id.description: Era in which the block was created in.

public_key.description: Public key of the signing validator.
